statements: SELECT * FROM investor_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM investor_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, investment_goal FROM investor_profiles WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Aggressive';
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, risk_tolerance FROM investor_profiles WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, risk_tolerance FROM investor_profiles WHERE risk_tolerance='High'
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, investment_goal FROM investor_profiles WHERE age < 40 AND risk_tolerance='Medium' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles WHERE investment_goal='Retirement' OR investment_goal='Education' ORDER BY age ASC, name DESC
SELECT id, name, risk_tolerance FROM investor_profiles WHERE age >= 25 AND investment_goal='Wealth Building'
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM investor_profiles WHERE investor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM investment_details WHERE risk_tolerance > 0.5;
SELECT investment_goal FROM investment_details WHERE investor_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, email FROM investor_profiles WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM investor_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT investor_id, investment_goal FROM investment_details WHERE risk_tolerance > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT investor_id, first_name, last_name, email, investment_goal FROM investor_profiles JOIN investment_details ON investor_profiles.investor_id = investment_details.investor_id WHERE investment_goal = 'Retirement';
SELECT * FROM investors WHERE risk_tolerance = 'Low'
SELECT full_name, email FROM investors WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01'
SELECT investor_id, phone_number FROM investors ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT * FROM investment_goals WHERE target_amount > 10000.00
SELECT goal_description, priority FROM investment_goals WHERE priority < 3
SELECT * FROM investors WHERE risk_tolerance='low' ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT investor_id, full_name, email FROM investors WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01'
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM investors WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM risk_tolerances WHERE min_score > 3 AND max_score < 7 ORDER BY description ASC
SELECT * FROM investment_goals WHERE target_amount > 10000 AND priority < 3
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT investor_name, investor_email FROM investors ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_tolerances WHERE risk_tolerance_level = 'High';
SELECT goal_name, goal_description FROM investment_goals WHERE goal_name LIKE '%Retirement%';
SELECT investor_id, investment_amount, investment_date FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, investment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM investor_data ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, investment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT investor_name, investor_email FROM investors WHERE investor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM risk_tolerances WHERE risk_tolerance_level LIKE '%high%' OR risk_tolerance_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT goal_name, goal_description FROM investment_goals WHERE goal_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT investor_name, risk_tolerance_level, goal_name FROM investors JOIN risk_tolerances ON investors.investor_id = risk_tolerances.risk_tolerance_id JOIN investment_goals ON investors.investor_id = investment_goals.goal_id ORDER BY investor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM investor_profiles WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT investment_type, amount_invested FROM investments WHERE investor_id = 2 ORDER BY amount_invested DESC;
SELECT goal_type, goal_description FROM investment_goals WHERE goal_type LIKE 'Retirement%';
SELECT investor_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM investment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investor_profiles WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM investor_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT goal_type, goal_description FROM investment_goals WHERE investor_id = 2 ORDER BY goal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount_invested > 10000 AND investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM investment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
